Plot: An ex-cop and his family are the target of an evil force that is using mirrors as a gateway into their home.
Title: Mirrors
Writer: Alexandre Aja (screenplay), Grégory Levasseur (screenplay), Sung-ho Kim (Korean motion picture "Into the Mirror")
Actors: Kiefer Sutherland, Paula Patton, Cameron Boyce, Erica Gluck
tomatoConsensus: Inconsistency and listless plot make this K-horror remake a less-than-frightening time at the movies.
